source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain.

generated_critique: The caption includes subjective adjectives like "dramatic" and "eerie," as well as the speculative phrase "appears to," all of which are prohibited by the instructions. The description of motion is also somewhat abstract with the word "evolves." The caption should be revised to describe the motion more directly and factually. It should state that the layered storm cloud rotates as internal lightning flashes, illuminating its structure, while a column of rain falls from its base.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video shows a rotating supercell storm cloud at night. The cloud has a stacked, layered structure that is illuminated from within by flashes of internal lightning, which cast a purple and white light. A column of rain falls from the base of the storm onto the dark landscape below.
